name: Aang's Airbending Academy
description: Ancient scrolls and wind chimes line this tranquil chamber. Adult Aang stands at the center, mild breezes circling around him. A pair of ornate stands hold an Air Glider and a set of Wind Resonance Crystals.

air_currents_puzzle.completion_message: A gentle gale stirs in harmony with your spirit, revealing a hidden path of wind.
